featured.text: Then in the Victorian era (19th century), weaving companies began to systematically record and formalize the system of setts for commercial purposes.

definition.zh_def: 有系統地，按照一定的計劃或程序進行的。
definition.en_def: In a methodical and organized manner, following a specific plan or procedure.
definition.example: The researchers systematically collected data over several months.
